title: African Chicken Stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 whole chicken, deboned and cut into bite-sized pieces', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 onion, chopped', '1 large potato, diced', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried crushed chillies', '1 teaspoon salt', '250ml (8 fl oz) water', '100g (3Â¾ oz) unsweetened natural-style peanut butter', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed']
